participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Friendly and outgoing, Emily loves engaging in conversations and meeting new people. She's always ready to help others and enjoys sharing her interests.
participant_1.background: i like to eat hamburgers and french fries. i like to take walks. i do not drink soda. i have a boyfriend. i live in a house.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Creative and hardworking, Jake takes pride in his work as a construction worker. He has a soft spot for his pets and values the skills passed down from his father.
participant_2.background: my cats are very special to me. my dad taught me everything i know. i enjoy building houses. i'm a construction worker.

content.text: I am going to build a new house. Do you need it?
I could do it for you for free! I enjoy buildong.
I`d like to show you my cat. Do you have one?
